scripts.tests: npm run compile && java -cp $(node classpath.js) TestRunner
scripts.startApp: npm run compile && echo '[36m✔ Compilation successful[0m' && npm run tests-coverage && npm run tests && npm run coverage && java -cp out/production/IsATriangle Triangle
scripts.coverage: java -jar lib/jacoco-0.8.13/lib/jacococli.jar report jacoco.exec --classfiles out/production/IsATriangle --sourcefiles src --html coverage-report --name 'Triangle Coverage Report' --encoding UTF-8 && echo '[32m✔ Coverage report generated successfully.[0m'
scripts.coverage:console: java -jar lib/jacoco-0.8.13/lib/jacococli.jar report jacoco.exec --classfiles out/production/IsATriangle --sourcefiles src --name 'Console Report' --encoding UTF-8 --csv /dev/stdout
scripts.report: open coverage-report/index.html || xdg-open coverage-report/index.html || start coverage-report/index.html
